files.description:
READ ME FILE - this is relevant for three different do files:
1- The do file that measures sectors' age (minimum, median, and other proxies)
2- The do file that constructs share of high and low skilled workers using LFS data 
3- The do file that calculates firm entry and exit and employment of entrant and incumbent firms
